sentences.en: A few kilometres after the village, turn right to Montelabate.
sentences.cn: 过了村庄之后再前行几公里，向右转前往蒙特拉贝特。

sentences.en: Houses in the village are selling for astronomical prices.
In 1766 he excommunicated the village for its "depraved diversion."
sentences.cn: 1766年，他以“堕落地享乐”为由将那个村庄逐出教会。

sentences.en: Jack was a folk hero in the Greenwich Village bars.
sentences.cn: 在格林尼治村的酒吧里杰克是人们心目中的英雄。

sentences.en: The bus drew up in the village square and disgorged its passengers.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车驶达乡村广场后停车下客。

sentences.en: The case has set neighbour against neighbour in the village.
sentences.cn: 这件事使得村里邻里间反目成仇。

sentences.en: The commission pinpoints inadequate housing as a basic problem threatening village life.
sentences.cn: 该委员会明确指出住房不足是威胁村民生活的根本问题。

sentences.en: The house where she lives was once the village post office.
sentences.cn: 她现在住的房子曾经是村里的邮局。

sentences.en: The road snaked through forested mountains, past the village of San Antonio.
sentences.cn: 这条路在林木覆盖的山上蜿蜒前行，经过圣安东尼奥村。

sentences.en: The village is a settlement of just fifty houses.
sentences.cn: 这个村子里只住了50户人。

sentences.en: The village is haunted by the ghosts of the dead children.
sentences.cn: 死去的孩子们的幽灵常在该村出没。

sentences.en: The walk from the village to Greystones was uphill all the way.
sentences.cn: 从村子到格雷斯通斯走的一直都是上坡路。

sentences.en: They climbed upward along the steep cliffs surrounding the village.
sentences.cn: 他们沿着村庄周围的陡峭悬崖往上爬。

sentences.en: They dragged him to the village square and chopped his head off.
sentences.cn: 他们将他拖到村里的广场上，把他的头砍了下来。

sentences.en: We ran across some old friends in the village.
sentences.cn: 我们在村里偶然碰见了一些老朋友。

phrases.tran_cn: 东村（在美国纽约市曼哈顿）
n. 奥运村；奥林匹克村
n. 农村公社；村落社会

trans.tran_en: a very small town in the countryside
a very small town in the countryside
